channel.title: How to calculate overtime based on check in check out from employee checkin list?
channel.description: How to calculate overtime based on check in check out from employee checkin list ? I need to filter the overtime hours as Normal OT, Holiday OT

item.title: How to calculate overtime based on check in check out from employee checkin list?
item.dc:creator: akhilkp
item.description:
I have both day shift and night shift with multiple employee checkin for various employees.At a time single shift assigned to an employee.But i need to calculate Normal OT and Holiday OT. Also the employees working in multiple projects at a time. They have requirement to visit different client site on daily basis. Also I need to calculate the overtime on project wise whether it is Normal OT or Holiday OT. For the client site visit the employees using frappe HR mobile app.But in office they have a bio metric device.

Read full topic
item.source: How to calculate overtime based on check in check out from employee checkin list?
